descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JgONqIkloOQ][youtube]fhllgekwKPs[/youtube]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/macesc.jpg/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/2876/macesc.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


This mod adds 5 craftable iron Maces to the game.
Thanx to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2531318]FrankFamily[/url] for his work on adding them to the crafting bench.

These are BRAND NEW MODELS and HAND MADE textures. 


[center][b][size=24pt][font=Onyx][color=orange]Installation[/color][/font][/size][/b][/center]


1ยบ/ Copy the content of the archive (3 files named \"d0nutzs armory - Iron Maces\" but different extensions: \".bsa\",\".bsl\" & \".esp\". The 3 must be copied) into your Data folder (usually: program files/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data)
2ยบ/ Overwrite if prompted
3ยบ/ Enjoy!
4ยบ/ Endorse... Thanks in advance :)

For uninstalling:
If you used NMM you will uninstall it quite easy, otherwise delete the 3 files you copied.



Please also consider these mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30685]d0nutz Armory - Iron Daggers[/url]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/689/irondaggers.jpg/][IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/1631/irondaggers.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30266]d0nutz Armory - Iron Axes[/url]

[URL=http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/2712/d0nutzarmory.jpg/][IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/2712/d0nutzarmory.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
author: d0nutz and FrankFamily
